name: Ant-venture (One Hour Game Jam 117)
description:
This is tiny arcade game, in which you're an ant out on an Ant-venture. Collect food for your colony and avoid getting attacked by spiders. It was made in under an hour using PICO-8, for the 117th One Hour Game Jam. If you're interested in how it works, the source code is available.

The theme for this One Hour Game Jam was 'the world below'.

Instructions

  • Use the arrow keys to move and collect as many food pellets as possible.
  • Dodge the fast moving spiders that run across the screen.
  • Try to beat your high score!
